definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Objective To verify the specificity and validity of the microbial limit tests of glycyrrhetinic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立适合于甘草酸的微生物限度检查方法。

sentences.english: Almonds contain lots of oxalates and should be eaten only in moderation.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁含有大量草酸，应该适量食用。

sentences.english: Objective To compare diffenrent amounts of the glycyrrhizic acid extracted by two methods-decoct method and Ammonia-water method.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较水酸法和氨水法提取甘草酸含量的变化。

sentences.english: Porous alumina was prepared by anodization in oxalic acid electrolyte.
sentences.chinese: 在草酸电解液中，用阳极氧化法制备了多孔氧化铝。

sentences.english: There are no correlation of mycelial dry weights with oxalate production.
sentences.chinese: 菌丝产量与草酸产量没有相关性。

sentences.english: Simulation and Inhibition of Calcium Oxalate Urinary Stone in Vitro;
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨尿液成分对草酸钙尿结石形成的影响。

sentences.english: Things break apart, forms these products.
sentences.chinese: 草酸分解了，生成了这些产物。

sentences.english: A salt obtained by the reaction of uranium salts with oxalic acid .
sentences.chinese: 铀盐和草酸反应产生的一种盐。

sentences.english: Oxalic acid with many metals to form water-soluble complexes.
sentences.chinese: 草酸能与许多金属形成溶于水的络合物。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the anti-inflammatory effects of 3,4-oxo-isopropylidene-shikimic acid (ISA).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究异亚丙基莽草酸的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Gemcitabine-oxaliplatin combination therapy is a promising one for treating advanced hepatocellular carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 结论吉西他宾联合草酸铂化疗方案效果较好。

sentences.english: After that, we conducted the statistic analysis on the empirical data.
sentences.chinese: 结果拆方后甘草酸含量经数理统计分析有明显差异。

sentences.english: The refining on industrial slaked lime with ammonium oxalate as a main raw material was made.
sentences.chinese: 本实验以草酸铵为主要原料对工业消石灰进行精制。

sentences.english: It is reported that the electrolytic process of oxalic to glyoxalic acid by electroreduction on titanium cathode in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道在钛阴极上草酸还原制乙醛酸的电解工艺。

sentences.english: A banana tissue electrode sensitized for oxalate has been prepared by coupling the banana pulp tissue with an oxygen electrode.
sentences.chinese: 将香焦组织与氧电极偶合，制成了草酸生物组织电极。
